message: Let's split relatively evenly, but slightly in my favor considering the inflation. This ensures we both benefit from ending the game quickly.
Let's split it evenly. It's fair and we both get the full value of our share since it's still early in the game.
Bob, time is money!  I'm taking a slight hit with inflation, so let's end this.  My offer is the best it's going to get.
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, I think this is a reasonable adjustment to the split.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm losing money with every round we play.  Take this offer and let's be done with it.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But I'm not losing value, you are. I think this split is more than fair considering the circumstances.
Bob, this is my final offer.  You can take it now, or we both risk losing even more. I'm willing to accept a smaller share to end this now, but I won't be taken advantage of.
I think we've reached the point where it's clear I have the upper hand. I'm willing to end this, but I'm not going to give up my advantage. This is my final offer.
